alert.note: Alert for Crow Wing; Northern Aitkin; South Aitkin (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 05 at 10:11PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Aitkin and southeastern Crow Wing Counties through 1045 PM CDT... At 1011 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles northeast of Cuyuna, to near Upper South Long Lake, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds gusts up to 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Aitkin around 1025 PM CDT. Garrison around 1030 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Mille Lacs Lake and Palisade. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Crow Wing; Northern Aitkin; South Aitkin
